## Source: ossf-package-analysis (aefb518974135eb466833c5ca5eba8804ce30a3771fb23eb70a4cab52747e544)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'pyyal' @ 94.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
